rdf:Description.dc:title: Soapstone and seed beads : arts and crafts at the Charles Camsell Hospital, a tuberculosis sanatorium 1993 arts and crafts at the Charles Camsell Hospital, a tuberculosis sanatorium /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Staples, Annalisa R., 1964-
McConnell, Ruth L.
Oakes, Jill E. (Jill Elizabeth), 1952-
McCormack, Patricia Alice, 1947-
rdf:Description.dc:description: "The Charles Camsell garment collection / Jill E. Oakes ; Patricia A. McCormack".

This account of the handicraft program for native patients at the Charles Camsell Hospital, Edmonton, Alberta (a sanatorium for tuberculosis patients from the Northwest Territories in the 1940s-1960s), describes both the therapeutic aspects and the artifacts produced, with a catalogue of representative items which are now held at the Alberta Provincial Museum.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Charles Camsell Hospital.
